class Group

Detailed Description

A scene graph node that represents a 2-dimensional image with a 3D position.

void render ( RenderState &  state  )  const [protected, virtual]

Render this object, for inner use.

Note: Sprite3D should be rendered only at second rendering pass(pass=2). In other cases, do nothing. メモ： 改良の余地があるな……。あとappearanceがNULLの時は”何もしない”ではなく ”デフォルトでレンダー”にすべき。
